description_en:
**Olaplex No.4C Bond Maintenance Clarifying Shampoo 250 ml** is a deeply clarifying shampoo that protects and enhances the health and shine of your hair.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Olaplex No.4C Bond Maintenance Clarifying Shampoo 250 ml**: 
â­ Dispense desired amount into hands and emulsify. 
â­ Apply to wet hair, focusing on the scalp and working through to ends. 
â­ Lather fully and leave on for up to 5 minutes. Rinse. 
â­ Follow up with Olaplex No.5 Bond Maintenance Conditioner or No.8 Bond Intense Moisture Mask for extra moisture. 

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Olaplex No.4C Bond Maintenance Clarifying Shampoo 250 ml**: 
â­ water (aqua/eau) â­ phyllostachys bambusoides extract â­ pisum sativum (pea) peptide â­ maltodextrin â­ maltodextrin/vp copolymer â­ pvp â­ polysorbate 20 â­ fragrance (parfum) â­ artocarpus heterophyllus fruit extract â­ sodium benzoate â­ bis-aminopropyl diglycol dimaleate â­ sodium metabisulfite â­ potassium sorbate â­ sodium phytate â­ leuconostoc/radish root ferment filtrate â­ lactobacillus ferment â­ ethylhexylglycerin â­ phenoxyethanol â­ hexyl cinnamal â­ limonene â­ citral â­ linalool â­ citronellol.

description_en:
**Olaplex Best Of The Bond Builders (Pro Kit)**: A comprehensive hair care set that includes four essential products to restore and strengthen damaged hair. â­ **Olaplex No.0:** Intensive Bond Building Hair Treatment, use before washing. â­ **Olaplex No.3:** Repairs and strengthens damaged hair. â­ **Olaplex No.4:** Shampoo that repairs and protects hair from daily damage. â­ **Olaplex No.5:** Conditioner that hydrates, repairs and protects hair. Leaves hair visibly healthier, silkier and shinier.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Olaplex Best Of The Bond Builders (Pro Kit)**:
â­ Apply **Olaplex No.0** to dry hair before washing, leave on for 10 minutes. â­ Apply **Olaplex No.3** afterwards, leave on for 10 minutes and rinse. â­ Apply **Olaplex No.4** to wet hair, massage gently. â­ Apply **Olaplex No.5** after shampoo, leave on for 3 minutes and rinse.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Olaplex Best Of The Bond Builders (Pro Kit)**:
â­ Free of parabens, sulfates, gluten, phthalates, and phosphates.

**Olaplex No.4D Clean Volume Detox Dry Shampoo 250 ml** is a healthy scalp dry shampoo, infused with patented OLAPLEX Bond Building Technology. It leaves your hair looking first-day fresh, with clean, weightless body, and a calm, comfortable scalp. Clinically proven not to clog pores or leave a white powdery residue.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Olaplex No.4D Clean Volume Detox Dry Shampoo 250 ml**:
â­ Shake well before and during use. Section hair.
â­ Lift a section of hair and position the bottle 6-10" away from the roots.
â­ Spray onto roots.
â­ Repeat this process taking new sections as you move through the hair.
â­ Wait 30 seconds and massage into scalp.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Olaplex No.4D Clean Volume Detox Dry Shampoo 250 ml**:
â­ water (aqua/eau), butylene glycol, glycerin, hydroxyethylcellulose, palmitoyl pentapeptide-83 amide, acetyl tetrapeptide-3, myristoyl pentapeptide-17, bis-aminopropyl diglycol dimaleate, sodium hyaluronate, biotin, panthenol, avena sativa (oat) kernel extract, pantethine, aminomethyl propanol, sorbic acid, rhizobian gum, benzoic acid, sodium benzoate, dextran, trifolium pratense (clover) flower extract, citric acid, phenoxyethanol, chlorphenesin, potassium sorbate.

#Olaplex #DryShampoo #Hair #Beauty #HairCare #Detox #Volume #HealthyHair #HairGoals #SaudiBeauty

description_en:
**Olaplex** Hair Repair Treatment Kit: The most comprehensive, immediately effective at-home hair repair routine for all hair types. Our most powerful at-home bond-building treatments + the bestselling nourishing and hydrating shampoo and conditioner to maintain your healthiest hair.

â­ Full Size NÂº.0 Intensive Bond Building Treatment (5.24 fl. oz. / 155 mL)
â­ Full Size NÂº.3 Hair Perfectorâ„¢ (3.3 fl. oz. / 100 mL)
â­ Travel Size NÂº.4 Bond MaintenanceÂ® Shampoo (3.3 fl. oz. / 100 mL)
â­ Travel Size NÂº.5 Bond MaintenanceÂ® Conditioner (3.3 fl. oz. / 100 mL)

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Olaplex**:
â­ NÂº.0: Evenly distribute from root to tip. (Use weekly or 2-3 times a week for very damaged hair as the first step in a two-step routine with NÂº.3 before cleansing.)
â­ NÂº.3: Apply from scalp to ends. (Use weekly or 2-3 times a week for very damaged hair as the second step in a two-step routineâ€“a pre-shampoo treatment.)
â­ NÂº.4: Concentrate on the scalp and work through to ends. (Use daily or any time you cleanse your hair.)
â­ NÂº.5: Apply root to tip, focusing on mid-lengths to ends. (Use after NÂº.4 daily or any time you cleanse and condition.)

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Olaplex**:
â­ Ingredients listed in detail above.

description_en:
**Olaplex Bond Moisture Mask No8 100ml** is a luxurious hair mask designed to repair and revitalize damaged hair. â­ Adds shine and smoothness. â­ Provides intense moisture. â­ Suitable for all hair types. â­ pH balanced formula. â­ Free of parabens, phthalates, phosphates, sulfates, gluten, and nuts.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Olaplex Bond Moisture Mask No8 100ml**: 
â­ Apply to clean, damp hair from mid-lengths to ends. â­ Leave on for 10 minutes. â­ Rinse thoroughly. â­ Use weekly for best results. â­ Start with 2 pumps for shoulder-length hair; use more for longer, thicker hair; less for fine or short hair.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Olaplex Bond Moisture Mask No8 100ml**: 
â­ Water (Aqua/Eau) , Dimethicone, Cetyl Alcohol, Persea Gratissima (Avocado) Oil, Glycerin, Stearyl Alcohol, Ethylhexyl Olivate, Behentrimonium Chloride, Cetrimonium Bromide, Limnanthes Alba (Meadowfoam) Seed Oil, Oryza Sativa (Rice) Bran Oil, Quaternium-80, Squalane, Rosa Canina (Rose Hip) Seed Extract, Ceramide AP, Ceramide NP, Hydrolyzed Jojoba Esters, Sodium Hyaluronate, Sodium PCA, Bis-Aminopropyl Diglycol Dimaleate, Arginine, Jojoba Esters, Panthenol, Carthamus Tinctorius (Safflower) Seed Oil, Cannabis Sativa (Hemp) Seed Oil, Glycine, Alanine, Serine, Valine, Isoleucine, Proline, Threonine, Guar Hydroxypropyltrimonium Chloride, Histidine , Hydroxyethylcellulose, Phenylalanine, Aspartic Acid, PCA, Phosphatidylcholine, Citric Acid, Sodium Lactate, Ethylhexylglycerin, Sodium Benzoate, Phenoxyethanol, Bis-Cetearyl Amodimethicone, Propylene Glycol, Isopropyl Alcohol, Sodium Nitrate, Tocopherol

Fragrance (Parfum), Citral, Hexyl Cinnamal, Limonene

**Olay Luminous Niacinamide + Vitamin C Face Cream Moisturizer 50 gm** is the perfect cream for radiant and healthy-looking skin. This cream provides instant hydration and helps reduce the appearance of dark spots. It's specially formulated to penetrate deep into the skin's layers to reveal a natural glow. It features fast absorption and a non-greasy formula. Suitable for dry/dull skin.

â­ Use as part of your daily skincare routine.

â­ Instant hydration lasting up to 24 hours.

It features Collagen Peptides that work like naturally occurring collagen in the skin, plus 99% Pure Niacinamide. It deeply penetrates the skin (epidermis layer only) to instantly plump, visibly firm, and smooth fine lines for plump and bouncy skin all day long. 

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Olay Regenerist Collagen Peptide 24 Face Moisturizer 50 gm**:

â­ Gently massage until fully absorbed. 
â­ Use daily for best results. 

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Olay Regenerist Collagen Peptide 24 Face Moisturizer 50 gm**: 
â­ Collagen Peptides. 
â­ 99% Pure Niacinamide. 
â­ Other moisturizing ingredients.

description_en:
**Olay Luminous Niacinamide + AHA Face Cream Moisturizer 50 gm** is your perfect solution for clearer, smoother skin. â­Reduces the appearance of stubborn spots, including acne marks, melasma, freckles, and sun spots. â­Scientifically advanced formula combines AHA (Lactic Acid) that acts on the skin's surface and Niacinamide that penetrates 10 layers deep^, targeting the root causes of spots across skin layers. â­Lightweight, fast-absorbing, and non-greasy. â­Dermatologist-tested and non-comedogenic. â­Formulated with Niacinamide (Vitamin B3) + AHA (Lactic Acid) + Pro-Vitamin B5 + Vitamin C. â­Formulated without sulfates, parabens, phthalates, petrolatum, and mineral oils.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Olay Luminous Niacinamide + AHA Face Cream Moisturizer 50 gm**: â­Apply an appropriate amount to your face after cleansing. â­Gently massage until fully absorbed. â­Use morning and night for best results.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Olay Luminous Niacinamide + AHA Face Cream Moisturizer 50 gm**: â­Niacinamide (Vitamin B3), â­AHA (Lactic Acid), â­Pro-Vitamin B5, â­Vitamin C.

#Skincare #Olay #Moisturizer #Beauty #HealthySkin #Niacinamide #AHA #FaceCream #SkincareProducts #SaudiArabia

â­ Apply a suitable amount to your cleansed skin.

â­ Use morning and night for best results.

â­ Other effective ingredients.

**Olay Luminous Serum Vitamin C + Niacinamide for Even & Glowing Skin 30 ml** is your secret to radiant, even-toned skin. This super serum combines the power of Vitamin C and Niacinamide to visibly even skin tone, reduce the appearance of dark spots, and reveal your natural glow.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Olay Luminous Serum Vitamin C + Niacinamide for Even & Glowing Skin 30 ml**:
â­ Apply a few drops to clean, dry skin.
â­ Gently massage until fully absorbed.
â­ Use twice daily, morning and night, for best results.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Olay Luminous Serum Vitamin C + Niacinamide for Even & Glowing Skin 30 ml**:

description_en:
**Olay Luminous Niacinamide + AHA Face Super Serum, 30 ml** delivers clearer, smoother skin by reducing stubborn spots like acne marks, melasma, freckles, and sunspots.  AHA (Lactic Acid) works on the skin's surface while Niacinamide penetrates 10 layers deep^, targeting the root causes of spots. This lightweight, fast-absorbing serum is non-comedogenic and formulated without sulfates, parabens, phthalates, petrolatum, and mineral oils. Use with an AHA moisturizer for best results.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Olay Luminous Niacinamide + AHA Face Super Serum, 30 ml**:
â­ Apply a suitable amount to clean, dry skin.
â­ Gently massage until fully absorbed.
â­ Use morning and night.
â­ Use with an AHA moisturizer for best results.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Olay Luminous Niacinamide + AHA Face Super Serum, 30 ml**:
â­ Niacinamide (Vitamin B3)
â­ AHA (Lactic Acid)
â­ Pro-Vitamin B5
â­ Vitamin C

#Skincare #FaceSerum #Olay #Niacinamide #AHA #HealthySkin #Beauty #SkincareProducts #SaudiArabia #SkincareRoutine

description_en:
**Olay Face Wash Natural White 100 ml** is a deep cleansing face wash that thoroughly cleanses your skin to remove impurities, leaving it radiant and glowing. Thanks to its rich formula with natural ingredients, **Olay Face Wash Natural White 100 ml** helps inhibit melanin production, contributing to the restoration of your skin's natural radiance. The gentle foam of this cleanser removes traces of makeup, preparing your skin for your daily skincare routine. 

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Olay Face Wash Natural White 100 ml**: 
â­ Wet your face with lukewarm water. 
â­ Apply an appropriate amount of **Olay Face Wash Natural White 100 ml** to your hands. 
â­ Gently massage your face in circular motions. 
â­ Rinse your face with cool water. 
â­ Use morning and evening. 

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Olay Face Wash Natural White 100 ml**: 
â­ Natural ingredients.

description_en:
**Olay Luminous Brightening Night Cream 50ml** adds a new meaning to the term 'beauty sleep', by providing you with essential hydration all night & repairing your skin overnight to reveal its natural glow. Enriched with Niacinamide, it brightens & evens skin tone, reduces the appearance of dark spots, and gives you the youthful glow you crave. It's formulated with Vitamin B3, Vitamin E, Pro-vitamin B5 & Vitamin P to boost skin translucency from the inside out. It also has rich moisturizing ingredients to reduce the appearance of dull, dry skin. Suitable for everyday use.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Olay Luminous Brightening Night Cream 50ml**: 
â­ Apply an appropriate amount to your cleansed skin. 
â­ Use at night before bed. 
â­ For best results, use Olay Luminous essences before applying the cream.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Olay Luminous Brightening Night Cream 50ml**: 
â­ Niacinamide 
â­ Vitamin B3 
â­ Vitamin E 
â­ Pro-vitamin B5 
â­ Vitamin P 
â­ Rich moisturizing ingredients

description_en:
**Olay Cleansing Device Refill Brush**: Experience healthier, younger-looking skin with the **Olay Cleansing Device Refill Brush** refill kit. This replacement brush for the Micro-Sculpting Super Cleansing System delivers 4x more effective cleansing*, even removing stubborn makeup. Simply massage your cleanser onto your skin and let the system work its magic. The soft-bristle brush heads are perfect for daily use as part of your Olay routine, deeply purifying your skin and preparing it for hydration, maximizing the effectiveness of anti-aging ingredients**. For best results, replace the brush head every 3 months (or sooner if bristles become deformed).

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Olay Cleansing Device Refill Brush**:
â­ Use as part of the Olay Regenerist Cleansing System.
â­ Replace brush head every 3 months or when bristles become deformed.
â­ Massage cleanser onto skin before using the brush.
â­ Suitable for all skin types.
â­ 4x more effective cleansing than using facial cleanser alone.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Olay Cleansing Device Refill Brush**:
â­ Soft bristles.
â­ Durable, high-quality construction.
â­ Compatible brush head for the Olay cleansing system.

description_en:
**Oral-B Essential Waxed Mint Dental Floss, 50 Meter** is the perfect choice for achieving optimal oral hygiene. â­ **Oral-B Essential** provides deep and effective cleaning, leaving your mouth feeling fresh and clean. â­ **Oral-B Essential** features a smooth, satin-like texture that's gentle on gums. â­ It easily reaches those hard-to-reach tight spaces between teeth. â­ It's strong and shred-resistant, ensuring comfortable and effective cleaning. â­ It's flavored with a refreshing mint taste. 

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Oral-B Essential**: 
â­ Cut about 45cm of floss. â­ Wind most of the floss around your middle fingers. â­ Hold the floss taut between your thumbs and index fingers. â­ Gently guide the floss between your teeth using a gentle back-and-forth motion. â­ Curve the floss around each tooth in an up-and-down motion. â­ Repeat for each tooth. â­ Rinse your mouth with water or mouthwash. 

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Oral-B Essential**: 
â­ Waxed dental floss. â­ Mint flavor.

description_en:
**Oral-B** Complete Mint Fresh Toothpaste, 100ml, provides superior protection and a burst of freshness for a cool, clean mouth. â­ Protects against cavities. â­ Prevents plaque and tartar. â­ Whitens teeth. â­ Freshens breath. â­ Provides long-lasting freshness.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Oral-B** Complete Mint Fresh Toothpaste: â­ Apply a pea-sized amount of toothpaste to your toothbrush. â­ Brush your teeth in circular motions for two minutes. â­ Rinse your mouth thoroughly with water. â­ Use twice daily for best results.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Oral-B** Complete Mint Fresh Toothpaste: â­ Sodium Fluoride. â­ Other ingredients for superior cleaning and freshness. For best results, use with an **Oral-B** toothbrush. 

#OralB #toothpaste #oralcare #mouthhealth #healthyteeth #freshbreath #teethwhitening #cavityprevention #dentalcare #oralhygiene

description_en:
**Oral-B Toothbrush 3D Fresh 40 Medium (1+1 Free)** is your perfect companion for a dazzling smile. â­ Effectively removes surface stains with daily brushing. â­ Polishes your teeth for a bright smile. â­ Unique design with cleaning cups that surround each tooth for deep cleaning. â­ Powerful brush head to reach tight spaces while remaining gentle on enamel. â­ Outer gingival stimulators massage and stimulate gums. â­ Thorough cleaning for outstanding plaque removal. â­ Cleans tongue for fresh breath. 

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Oral-B Toothbrush 3D Fresh 40 Medium (1+1 Free)**: â­ Dentists recommend changing your brush every 3 months. â­ Brush your teeth only. â­ Do not chew or bite on the brush. â­ Do not use as a toy or without adult supervision. 

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Oral-B Toothbrush 3D Fresh 40 Medium (1+1 Free)**: â­ Soft nylon bristles. â­ Comfortable handle. â­ Ergonomically designed brush head. 

#OralB #toothbrush #dentalcare #oralhealth #brightSmile #teethwhitening #mouthcare #healthyteeth #freshbreath #dentalhygiene

description_en:
**Oral-B Satin Tape Floss Mint** instantly feels different as it releases a burst of mint freshness on contact. Its unique satin-like texture makes it comfortable to handle and use. It effectively cleans plaque and particles between your teeth and below the gumline, leaving your teeth feeling squeaky clean. By daily flossing with **Oral-B Satin Tape Floss Mint**, you do more to keep your teeth and gums healthy. For best results, use with Oral-B toothpaste and mouthwash.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Oral-B Satin Tape Floss Mint**: 
â­ Gently slide the floss between your teeth using a back-and-forth motion.
â­ Curve the floss around each tooth in a â€œCâ€ shape.
â­ Gently slide the floss below the gumline.
â­ Move the floss up and down along each tooth surface to remove plaque.
â­ Repeat for every tooth.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Oral-B Satin Tape Floss Mint**: 
â­ Smooth, silky nylon floss.
â­ Refreshing mint flavor.

#OralCare #DentalFloss #OralBFloss #HealthyTeeth #WhiteTeeth #HealthyGums #OralB #SatinFloss #MintFloss #DentalHygiene

description_en:
**Oral B Brush Heads Cross Action 2 pcs**: Experience clinically proven superior cleaning with **Oral B Brush Heads Cross Action 2 pcs**, surpassing ordinary manual toothbrushes. â­ The CrossAction brush head surrounds each tooth with bristles angled at 16 degrees. â­ 3D cleaning action (oscillating, rotating, pulsating) removes up to 100% more plaque than a manual toothbrush. â­ The timer helps you brush for the dentist-recommended two minutes. â­ Compatible with all Oral-B rechargeable electric toothbrushes (excluding Oral-B Pulsonic). â­ **Oral B Brush Heads Cross Action 2 pcs** are your ideal choice for a healthy, clean smile. 

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Oral B Brush Heads Cross Action 2 pcs**: â­ Wet the brush head and apply toothpaste. â­ Turn on the electric toothbrush. â­ Gently guide the brush head from tooth to tooth, focusing on each tooth for a few seconds. â­ Clean the outer, then inner, and finally chewing surfaces. 

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Oral B Brush Heads Cross Action 2 pcs**: â­ High-quality, soft bristles â­ Ergonomically designed brush head

#OralB #toothbrush #oralcare #dentalhealth #whiteteeth #teethcare #dentalbeauty #healthysmiling #teethwhitening #KSA

**Oral-B Vitality D100 Rechargeable Electric Toothbrush**: Experience superior cleaning with this rechargeable electric toothbrush.  The 2D cleaning technology oscillates and rotates to remove more plaque than a regular manual toothbrush. The professional Cross Action brush head surrounds each tooth with its 16Â° angled bristles.  A built-in timer helps you brush for a dentist-recommended two minutes.  For best results, use with Oral-B and Crest toothpaste.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Oral-B Vitality D100 Rechargeable Electric Toothbrush**:
â­ Wet the brush head and apply toothpaste.
â­ Turn on the toothbrush and brush for two minutes.
â­ Brush each section of your teeth for 30 seconds.
â­ Rinse the brush head after each use.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Oral-B Vitality D100 Rechargeable Electric Toothbrush**:
â­ Cross Action brush head
â­ Rechargeable handle
â­ Charger

description_en:
**Oral-B Power Toothbrush Vitality 100 Cross Action** provides a superior clean with its 2D cleaning action. The **Oral-B Power Toothbrush Vitality 100 Cross Action** features a round head designed with dentists to contour to each tooth, ensuring a deep clean that removes up to 100% more plaque than a regular manual toothbrush. It also features a built-in timer that vibrates every 30 seconds to remind you to brush for the dentist-recommended two minutes. Achieve a whiter smile every day with the **Oral-B Power Toothbrush Vitality 100 Cross Action**. 

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Oral-B Power Toothbrush Vitality 100 Cross Action**: 
â­ Wet the brush head and apply a small amount of toothpaste. 
â­ Turn on the brush and gently move it across your teeth for two minutes. 
â­ Rinse the brush head after each use. 

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Oral-B Power Toothbrush Vitality 100 Cross Action**: 
â­ Soft brush head. 
â­ Waterproof handle. 
â­ Rechargeable battery. 
â­ Built-in timer. 

#electrictoothbrush #oralb #toothcleaning #oralhealth #whitesmile #dentalcare #vitality #braun #2Daction #saudiarabia

description_en:
**Oral-B Vitality 100 Electric Toothbrush** provides a superior clean with its round head and 2D cleaning action, designed with dentists. â­ Removes up to 100% more plaque than a regular manual toothbrush. â­ Oscillating-rotating brush head contours to each tooth. â­ Built-in timer vibrates every 30 seconds to help you brush for a dentist-recommended 2 minutes. â­ Rechargeable toothbrush. â­ One cleaning mode: Daily Clean. 

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Oral-B Vitality 100 Electric Toothbrush**: 
â­ Wet the brush head and apply a pea-sized amount of toothpaste. â­ Turn on the brush and gently move it across your teeth for 2 minutes. â­ Rinse the brush head after each use. 

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Oral-B Vitality 100 Electric Toothbrush**: 
â­ Soft nylon brush head bristles. â­ Waterproof plastic handle. â­ Rechargeable lithium-ion battery.

description_en:
**Oral-B Power Toothbrush Vitality Cross Action** provides a superior clinically proven clean compared to a regular manual toothbrush. â­ Removes up to 100% more plaque and surface stains than a regular manual toothbrush. â­ 2D cleaning action oscillates and rotates for superior cleaning. â­ In-handle timer ensures you brush for the dentist-recommended 2 minutes. â­ Rechargeable for convenience. â­ Compatible with all Oral-B rechargeable toothbrush handles (except Oral-B sonic toothbrushes). â­ Made of high-quality materials. â­ Easy to use. â­ **Oral-B**, the #1 toothbrush brand used by dentists worldwide.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Oral-B Power Toothbrush Vitality Cross Action**: 
â­ Wet the brush head and apply toothpaste. â­ Turn on the brush and guide the head slowly from tooth to tooth. â­ Hold in place for a few seconds on each tooth. â­ Brush outsides, then insides, and finally chewing surfaces. â­ Replace brush head every 3 months.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Oral-B Power Toothbrush Vitality Cross Action**: 
â­ 1 Rechargeable electric toothbrush handle. â­ 1 CrossAction brush head. â­ 1 Charger.

description_en:
**Oral-B Vitality 300, Rechargeable Electric Toothbrush** is the perfect toothbrush to clean and protect your teeth. â­ Removes 100% more plaque than a regular manual toothbrush. â­ Protects gums. â­ Features 3 cleaning modes: daily clean, sensitive, and sensitive plus. â­ CrossAction round brush head with perfectly angled bristles to clean every tooth. â­ Built-in 2-minute timer, pausing every 30 seconds to remind you to change cleaning areas. â­ The #1 dentist recommended toothbrush brand worldwide.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Oral-B Vitality 300, Rechargeable Electric Toothbrush**: 
â­ Turn on the toothbrush and select the desired cleaning mode. â­ Clean each area of your mouth for at least 30 seconds. â­ Use the toothbrush for 2 minutes daily. â­ Rinse the brush head after each use.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Oral-B Vitality 300, Rechargeable Electric Toothbrush**: â­ CrossAction brush head. â­ Comfortable handle. â­ Rechargeable battery. â­ Built-in timer.

**Oral-B Toothpaste Disney Baby 75 Ml**, a unique toothpaste designed specifically for babies. Featuring beloved Disney characters to make brushing your baby's teeth a fun experience. 

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Oral-B Toothpaste Disney Baby 75 Ml**: 
â­ Apply a small amount of **Oral-B Toothpaste Disney Baby 75 Ml** to a soft toothbrush.
â­ Gently brush your baby's teeth using circular motions.
â­ Ensure you rinse your baby's mouth thoroughly with water after each brushing.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Oral-B Toothpaste Disney Baby 75 Ml**: 
â­ Fluoride
â­ Mild fruit flavor
â­ Sugar-free

description_en:
**Oral-B Essential Floss Unwaxed, 50 Meter** provides a thorough and effective clean for your teeth. â­ **Oral-B Essential Floss** cleans where your toothbrush can't reach. â­ Its unique formula with a polymer coating makes plaque removal easy. â­ It's easy to use, shred-resistant, and slides easily between teeth. â­ For best results, use with Oral-B and Crest toothpaste and mouthwash. 

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Oral-B Essential Floss Unwaxed, 50 Meter**: 
â­ Cut off an appropriate length of floss. â­ Gently insert the floss between your teeth using a gentle sawing motion. â­ Follow a C-shape motion around each tooth to remove plaque. â­ Use a clean section of floss for each tooth. 

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Oral-B Essential Floss Unwaxed, 50 Meter**: 
â­ Unwaxed nylon floss. â­ Polymer coating. 

#oralcare #teethcleaning #oralb #dentalfloss #oralhealth #teethwhitening #brightteeth #mouthcleanliness #unwaxedfloss #50meter

description_en:
**Oral-B Toothbrush Floss Action Refill EB-25 2 pcs** provides superior cleaning for healthier gums and a brighter smile. â­ Removes up to 100% more plaque than a regular manual toothbrush (when used with an Oral-B electric toothbrush). â­ Micropulse bristles for deep cleaning between teeth. â­ Professional inspired round brush head design. â­ Compatible with all Oral-B oscillating-rotating electric toothbrush handles (except Pulsonic). â­ Dentists recommend replacing brush head every 3-4 months. 

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Oral-B Toothbrush Floss Action Refill EB-25 2 pcs**: â­ Attach the brush head to your electric toothbrush handle. â­ Turn on the toothbrush and gently move it across your teeth and gums. â­ Brush twice daily for at least two minutes. â­ Replace brush head every 3-4 months or when bristles are frayed.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Oral-B Toothbrush Floss Action Refill EB-25 2 pcs**: â­ Food-grade safe brush head materials. â­ Soft yet effective MicroPulse bristles.

#OralB #ElectricToothbrush #Toothbrush #HealthyTeeth #DentalCare #OralHygiene #HealthyGums #FlossAction #TeethCleaning #SaudiArabia

**Oral-B Pro 3 - (3000) 3D Action Power Toothbrush** is the perfect electric toothbrush for a brighter, healthier smile.  Its effective 3D cleaning action removes plaque more efficiently than a regular manual toothbrush. 

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Oral-B Pro 3 - (3000) 3D Action Power Toothbrush**:
â­ Apply a small amount of toothpaste to the brush head.

â­ Clean the brush head after each use.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Oral-B Pro 3 - (3000) 3D Action Power Toothbrush**:

â­ Rechargeable battery.
â­ Gum pressure sensor technology.
â­ Built-in timer.

**Oral B Brush Heads Sensi Ultra Thin 2 pcs** provide a gentle yet effective clean. Designed in collaboration with dentists, these brush heads combine ultra-thin bristles for gum sensitivity and regular bristles for tough plaque removal.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Oral B Brush Heads Sensi Ultra Thin 2 pcs**: 
â­ Attach the brush head to your Oral-B electric toothbrush handle.
â­ Apply a small amount of toothpaste to the brush head.
â­ Brush your teeth using gentle circular motions for two minutes.
â­ Rinse the brush head thoroughly after each use.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Oral B Brush Heads Sensi Ultra Thin 2 pcs**: 
â­ Ultra-soft nylon bristles.
â­ Ergonomically designed round brush head.

â­ Removes up to 100% more plaque compared to a manual toothbrush.
â­ Reduces gum inflammation by up to 100% compared to a manual toothbrush.
â­ Designed with dentists.
â­ Compatible with most Oral-B electric toothbrush handles.

description_en:
**Oral-B iO3**, the rechargeable electric toothbrush that features Oral-Bâ€™s best technology. â­ Dentist-inspired round brush head. â­ Micro-vibrating bristles for a professional clean. â­ Clinically proven to remove 100% more plaque vs. a regular manual toothbrush*. â­ Built-in 2-minute timer with 30-second intervals. â­ Pressure sensor alerts you to over-brushing. â­ Display shows brushing modes, battery level, and brush head replacement reminder. â­ The #1 toothbrush brand used by dentists worldwide*. *Based on surveys of a representative worldwide sample of dentists carried out for P&G regularly. Do not use on children under age 3. Replace brush head every 3 months.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Oral-B iO3**: â­ Select your preferred brushing mode. â­ Apply an appropriate amount of toothpaste. â­ Brush for two minutes. â­ Avoid excessive pressure. â­ Recharge when battery is low. â­ Replace brush head every 3 months.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Oral-B iO3**: â­ Round brush head. â­ Soft, micro-vibrating bristles. â­ Rechargeable battery. â­ Display screen. â­ Pressure sensor. â­ Built-in timer.

description_en:
**Oral-B Pro Battery Precision Clean** Toothbrush for a superior clean! â­ Battery-powered toothbrush for effective cleaning. â­ Precision clean brush head cups each tooth for thorough cleaning. â­ Removes more plaque than a manual toothbrush. â­ Round brush head for comprehensive cleaning. 

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Oral-B Pro Battery Precision Clean**:
â­ Turn on the toothbrush by pressing the power button. â­ Apply a small amount of toothpaste to the brush head. â­ Brush your teeth using gentle circular motions for two minutes. â­ Rinse the brush head after each use.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Oral-B Pro Battery Precision Clean**:
â­ Soft enamel-safe brush head. â­ Rechargeable battery. â­ Ergonomic design for comfortable grip.

description_en:
**Oral B Rechargeable Toothbrush Star Wars Boys** is the perfect toothbrush for a healthy and thorough clean. â­ Waterproof handle for use with Oral-B Pro-Health Junior toothpaste. â­ Sensitive Clean brush heads for a gentle clean. â­ Compatible with Oral-B's Magic Timer app to teach your child to brush for the dentist-recommended 2 minutes. â­ Specially designed brush head surrounds each tooth for individual cleaning. â­ Extra-soft bristles are gentle on gums. â­ Suitable for ages 3+. â­ Includes 1 toothbrush, 1 charger, 1 brush head, and 4 stickers. â­ Rechargeable battery lasts 8 days. â­ Perfect for boys aged 3+. 

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Oral B Rechargeable Toothbrush Star Wars Boys**: â­ Brush your child's teeth after every meal or at least twice daily. â­ Use a pea-sized amount of toothpaste. â­ Supervise your child's brushing until good habits are established. â­ Not intended for children under 3 years old.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Oral B Rechargeable Toothbrush Star Wars Boys**: â­ Rechargeable electric toothbrush. â­ Charger. â­ Brush head. â­ 4 Stickers.

description_en:
**Oral-B Toothbrush Pro-Expert (0-2) Baby Soft** is designed specifically for kids aged 0-2, featuring fun Disney character designs to make brushing enjoyable. At this stage, children are learning to brush, and their baby teeth are still developing. Because their mouths are small and their hands unsteady, it's crucial to choose a brush that's just right for them.  **Oral-B Toothbrush Pro-Expert (0-2) Baby Soft** meets their unique needs.

â­ Helps protect tender gums
â­ Fits kids' small mouths
â­ Helps clean hard-to-reach back teeth
â­ Helps kids learn to brush

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Oral-B Toothbrush Pro-Expert (0-2) Baby Soft**:

â­ Clean the outer surfaces of your upper teeth, then your lower teeth.
â­ Clean the inner surfaces of your upper teeth, then your lower teeth.
â­ Clean the chewing surfaces.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Oral-B Toothbrush Pro-Expert (0-2) Baby Soft**:

(Ingredients not specified in provided data. Please provide product ingredients to complete this section.)

**Oral-B** Toothpaste provides effective gum and enamel repair.  This toothpaste helps rejuvenate gums and repair enamel in just 2 weeks thanks to its unique ActivRepair technology. It fights bacteria, defends teeth against acid erosion, and is suitable for sensitive teeth. It features a milder flavor and smooth texture.

description_en:
**Oral-B Electric Toothbrush Pro Io Series 7**, Oral-Bâ€™s best ever clean with revolutionary magnetic iO technology. The **Oral-B Electric Toothbrush Pro Io Series 7** combines powerful, but gentle micro-vibrations with Oral-B's unique dentist-inspired round brush head design for a professional clean feeling every day. â­ The Smart Pressure Sensor helps to keep you from brushing too hard to protect your gums and enamel. â­ AI Recognition using an interactive display helps guide you to your best clean for all areas of the mouth. â­ A 2-minute quadrant timer comes built-in that pulsates every 30 seconds, ensuring a complete clean. â­ The frictionless, smooth magnetic drive system transfers energy to the bristle tips for a clean that wows.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Oral-B Electric Toothbrush Pro Io Series 7**: â­ Attach the brush head to the toothbrush handle. â­ Place the toothbrush on the magnetic charger to charge. â­ Select the desired cleaning mode. â­ Apply an appropriate amount of toothpaste to the brush head. â­ Brush your teeth using gentle circular motions. â­ Use the built-in timer to ensure you brush all your teeth. â­ Rinse the toothbrush after each use.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Oral-B Electric Toothbrush Pro Io Series 7**: â­ Electric toothbrush handle. â­ Round brush head. â­ Magnetic charger. â­ Interactive color display. â­ Rechargeable battery. â­ Smart pressure sensor. â­ 3D tracking system.

description_en:
**Oral-B DB5 Kids Battery Toothbrush, 3+ Disney Princess** is a battery-powered toothbrush designed for kids aged 3 and up.  It features a small, round brush head that cups each tooth for a deeper, superior clean versus a manual toothbrush. Your children will love the fun Disney Princesses design, making brushing time enjoyable!

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Oral-B DB5 Kids Battery Toothbrush, 3+ Disney Princess**: 
â­ Apply a small amount of toothpaste to the brush head. 
â­ Gently brush your child's teeth using circular motions. 
â­ Ensure all tooth surfaces are cleaned, including the gum line. 
â­ Rinse the brush thoroughly after each use. 

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Oral-B DB5 Kids Battery Toothbrush, 3+ Disney Princess**: 
â­ Soft, round brush head. 
â­ Food-safe brush body materials. 
â­ Long-lasting battery power. 

For best results, use with Oral-B toothpaste, floss, and mouthwash. #OralB #KidsToothbrush #DisneyPrincess #Toothbrush #ElectricToothbrush #KidsOralCare #OralHygiene #HealthyTeeth #SaudiArabia #DentalCare

description_en:
**Oral B Rechargeable Toothbrush Frozen Girls** is the perfect toothbrush for kids aged 3 and up, for a healthy and thorough clean. This electric toothbrush features a waterproof handle, and sensitive toothbrush heads that provide a gentle brushing experience. Use it with the Disney Magic Timer App by Oral-B to make brushing fun for the dentist-recommended 2 minutes. 

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Oral B Rechargeable Toothbrush Frozen Girls**: 
â­ Brush teeth thoroughly after meals or at least twice a day. 
â­ Use a pea-sized amount of toothpaste for children under 3. 
â­ Supervise children's brushing until good habits are established. 
â­ Use the Disney Magic Timer app to encourage kids to brush for 2 minutes. 

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Oral B Rechargeable Toothbrush Frozen Girls**: 
â­ Waterproof handle. 
â­ Sensitive toothbrush heads with extra-soft bristles. 
â­ Rechargeable battery for an 8-day charge. 
â­ Four Disney Frozen themed stickers to customize the handle. 

#OralB #Frozen #GirlsToothbrush #KidsToothbrush #ElectricToothbrush #Toothbrush #KidsOralCare #DentalHygiene #SaudiArabia #OralCare

description_en:
**Oral-B Pro Expert Fluoride Toothpaste Whitening 75 Ml** is your go-to toothpaste for a whiter, healthier smile. â­It features a unique blend of whitening ingredients to remove surface stains and impurities. â­Experience healthier, stronger teeth starting from day 1 with continued use. â­Contains Stannous Fluoride Complex, a unique combination of ingredients clinically proven to protect your teeth against cavities, sensitivity, plaque, gum problems, stains, bad breath, tartar, and enamel erosion. â­Enjoy a refreshing mint flavor. 

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Oral-B Pro Expert Fluoride Toothpaste Whitening 75 Ml**: 
â­Apply an appropriate amount of **Oral-B Pro Expert Fluoride Toothpaste Whitening 75 Ml** to your toothbrush. â­Brush your teeth thoroughly using gentle circular motions for at least two minutes. â­Rinse your mouth with water. â­Use twice daily for best results.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Oral-B Pro Expert Fluoride Toothpaste Whitening 75 Ml**: 
â­Stannous Fluoride Complex â­Whitening Ingredients â­Natural Flavors.

description_en:
**Oral-B Pro Expert Fluoride Toothpaste Mint 75 Ml** provides comprehensive oral protection. â­It contains Stannous Fluoride Complex, a unique combination of ingredients clinically proven to deliver healthier and stronger teeth starting from day 1 with continued use. â­Combats cavities, sensitivity, and plaque buildup. â­Strengthens gums, and protects teeth against enamel erosion. â­For optimal results, use with Oral-B's electric toothbrushes. 

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Oral-B Pro Expert Fluoride Toothpaste Mint 75 Ml**: â­Apply a small amount to your toothbrush. â­Brush thoroughly twice daily. â­Do not swallow. 

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Oral-B Pro Expert Fluoride Toothpaste Mint 75 Ml**: â­Stannous Fluoride Complex. â­Other ingredients to enhance oral health.

description_en:
**Oral-B Battery Toothbrush Pulsar 3D White 35 Soft** provides a deep and effective clean. â­ Its soft bristles gently remove stains and polish teeth for a whiter, brighter smile. â­ The innovative design contours to your teeth, ensuring thorough cleaning of each tooth. â­ **Oral-B Battery Toothbrush Pulsar 3D White 35 Soft** is battery-operated with an included battery, making it easy to use. â­ Perfect for daily use, it maintains gum and teeth health. 

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Oral-B Battery Toothbrush Pulsar 3D White 35 Soft**: 
â­ Wet the brush head with water and apply toothpaste. â­ Place the toothbrush in your mouth and turn it on. â­ Guide the brush head slowly from tooth to tooth. â­ Hold the brush head in place for a few seconds before moving to the next tooth. â­ Brush the gums as well as the teeth, first the outsides, then the insides, finally the chewing surfaces. 

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Oral-B Battery Toothbrush Pulsar 3D White 35 Soft**: â­ High-quality soft bristles. â­ Durable brush head. â­ Powerful battery.

description_en:
**Oral B Orthodontic Toothbrush 35 Soft 1 Count**: Designed for superior oral care when wearing braces, the **Oral B Orthodontic Toothbrush 35 Soft 1 Count** features V-shaped bristles that effectively clean and remove plaque from teeth and braces, even in hard-to-reach areas.  Use it to clean wires, brackets, retainers, and other orthodontic appliances. The soft bristles are gentle on teeth, gums, and enamel. Achieve a brighter smile with **Oral B Orthodontic Toothbrush 35 Soft 1 Count**, the number one brand recommended by dentists worldwide.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Oral B Orthodontic Toothbrush 35 Soft 1 Count**:
â­ Apply a small amount of toothpaste to the brush.
â­ Brush your teeth using gentle circular motions for two minutes.
â­ Ensure you clean all wires and brackets on your braces.
â­ Rinse your mouth thoroughly with water afterward.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Oral B Orthodontic Toothbrush 35 Soft 1 Count**:
â­ Soft V-shaped nylon bristles.
â­ Comfortable plastic handle.

#OrthodonticToothbrush #OralB #Braces #OralHygiene #DentalHealth #TeethCare #BeautifulSmile #Riyadh #SaudiArabia #OralCare

description_en:
**Oral-B Pro-Expert Pro-Flex Medium Toothbrush** delivers a superior clean with gentle care. â­ Its flexible head adapts to the unique curves of your teeth and gum line for thorough cleaning. â­ Removes up to 34% more plaque than a regular manual toothbrush. â­ 16-degree angled CrissCross bristles penetrate hard-to-reach plaque between teeth. â­ Power Tip bristles reach deep and clean hard-to-reach areas. â­ Gentle on gums and enamel. â­ Helps reduce gingivitis and improve gum health. 

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Oral-B Pro-Expert Pro-Flex Medium Toothbrush**: 
â­ Brush your teeth at least twice daily using the **Oral-B Pro-Expert Pro-Flex Medium Toothbrush** and a suitable toothpaste. â­ Replace your toothbrush every 3 months or when bristles are frayed. 

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Oral-B Pro-Expert Pro-Flex Medium Toothbrush**: â­ Soft nylon bristles. â­ Flexible brush head. 

#toothbrush #oralb #oralhealth #dentalcare #teethcleaning #proexpert #proflex #healthyteeth #healthysmile #KSA

description_en:
**Oral-B Extra Soft Head Replacement Frozen** brush heads are specially designed for the gentle cleaning of children's teeth. The **Oral-B Extra Soft Head Replacement Frozen** features extra-soft bristles, a smaller head size, and shorter bristles for better accessibility and cleaning. The bristles change color to indicate replacement time. 

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Oral-B Extra Soft Head Replacement Frozen**: 
â­ Attach the brush head to your electric toothbrush. 
â­ Gently brush your child's teeth using circular motions. 
â­ Replace the brush head every 3 months or when the bristles change color. 

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Oral-B Extra Soft Head Replacement Frozen**: 
â­ Extra-soft nylon bristles. 
â­ Smaller brush head size. 
â­ Color change indicator.

description_en:
**Oral-B Toothpaste Kids Junior Star Wars (Boys) 75 Ml** is specially formulated to protect your child's teeth from cavities and bacteria, leaving them with a healthy smile and fresh breath all day long.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Oral-B Toothpaste Kids Junior Star Wars (Boys) 75 Ml**:
â­ Apply a small amount of **Oral-B Toothpaste Kids Junior Star Wars (Boys) 75 Ml** to a soft-bristled toothbrush.
â­ Gently brush your child's teeth using circular motions for two minutes.
â­ Make sure to clean all tooth surfaces, including the gum line.
â­ Use twice daily, morning and night.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Oral-B Toothpaste Kids Junior Star Wars (Boys) 75 Ml**:
â­ Fluoride to protect against cavities.
â­ Gentle cleaning agents for a kind clean.
â­ Delicious flavors to make brushing fun for kids.

description_en:
**Oral B Rechargeable Toothbrush Genius 9000 RoseGold**: Discover the smartest electric toothbrush from Oral-B, the #1 dentist-recommended brand worldwide. Experience superior cleaning with Pressure Control technology that reduces speed and alerts you if you brush too hard, and Position Detection technology to ensure you cover every area of your mouth.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Oral B Rechargeable Toothbrush Genius 9000 RoseGold**:
â­ Wet the brush head with water and apply toothpaste.
â­ Turn on the brush and move it slowly from tooth to tooth.
â­ Hold the brush head in place for a few seconds before moving to the next tooth.
â­ Brush the outsides, then the insides, and finally the chewing surfaces.
â­ Replace the brush head every 3 months or when its effectiveness decreases.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Oral B Rechargeable Toothbrush Genius 9000 RoseGold**:
â­ Rechargeable electric toothbrush.
â­ Rose gold handle.
â­ 4 brush heads.
â­ Dual charging travel case.
â­ Power adapter.

description_en:
**Oral-B Pro 500 Power Toothbrush 3D Action** delivers a superior clean, clinically proven to remove up to 100% more plaque than a regular manual toothbrush.  Features a round brush head that contours to each tooth, a built-in 2-minute timer (dentist-recommended brushing time), and a long-lasting battery (up to 2 weeks). Brush heads are designed with dentists for gentle yet effective cleaning. Gently whitens teeth from day one. The #1 dentist-recommended brand worldwide.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Oral-B Pro 500 Power Toothbrush 3D Action**: 
â­ Wet the brush head with water and apply toothpaste.
â­ Turn on the toothbrush and guide the brush head slowly from tooth to tooth.
â­ Hold the brush head in place for a few seconds before moving to the next tooth.
â­ Brush the outsides, then the insides, and finally the chewing surfaces.
â­ Replace the brush head every 3 months or when bristles are worn.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Oral-B Pro 500 Power Toothbrush 3D Action**:
â­ 1 x **Oral-B Pro 500 Power Toothbrush 3D Action**.
â­ 1 x Toothbrush Heads.
â­ 1 x Charging Station.

**Oral-B Professional Ultra Toothpaste** provides superior daily protection against cavities. â­ Protects enamel against future density loss. â­ Rebuilds tooth density. â­ Helps stop early-stage cavities. â­ Freshens breath with peppermint and eucalyptus. â­ The world's #1 dentist-recommended brand.

title_ar: **Ø§ÙˆØ±Ø§Ù„ - Ø¨ÙŠ ÙØ±Ø´Ø© Ø§Ø³Ù†Ø§Ù† Ø§ÙƒØ³Ø¨ÙŠØ±Øª 40 ÙˆØ³Ø·**
description_en:
**Oral-B Toothbrush Expert Anti-Bacterial 40 Medium** is your perfect partner for a healthy and clean smile. â­ Features CrissCross bristles that attack plaque from a perfect 16-degree angle. â­ Cleans along the gumline where plaque builds up easily. â­ Gently massages gums with soft gum stimulators. â­ Antibacterial bristle protection inhibits microbial growth. â­ Penetrates deeper between teeth to remove up to 90% of plaque in hard-to-reach areas. â­ Prevents bacteria growth on bristles for up to 3 months. â­ Gentle on enamel. â­ Ergonomic, nonslip handle. â­ Blue indicator bristles fade with use to gauge wear. 

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Oral-B Toothbrush Expert Anti-Bacterial 40 Medium**: â­ Dentists recommend replacing your toothbrush head every 3-4 months, or when bristles are faded and worn. â­ Not for children under 3 years of age.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Oral-B Toothbrush Expert Anti-Bacterial 40 Medium**: â­ Nylon bristles, â­ Plastic handle.

**Ousha Glue Black** is a professional eyelash glue designed for a long-lasting, perfect eye makeup look.  **Ousha Glue Black** securely and easily holds your false eyelashes in place. Its balanced formula is easy to remove without causing any problems. 

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Ousha Glue Black**:
â­ Ensure your false eyelashes are in the correct shape.
â­ Estimate the width of your eyelids and lashes.
â­ Trim lashes if necessary.
â­ Hold lashes with tweezers and apply glue to the inner lining.
â­ Apply a small amount of glue to your natural lashes (avoid contact with eyes).
â­ Secure the false lashes and press until they adhere.
â­ To remove lashes, use coconut oil or a mild moisturizer.

â­ (Ingredients will be listed here when available)
